job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>As part of the Wild Health Clarity Engineering team, you will be actively involved in building both frontend or backend application features. As part of a team with diverse skill sets, you will have an opportunity to provide your own unique value while also learning from the senior and architectural mentors on the team.<br> </p><br><p>A candidate will be expected to deliver quality software within spec within a timely manner defined within each sprint. &nbsp; </p><br><p>Each member of the team should possess a willingness to contribute to an overall team goal by not only producing software for their individual tasks, but also assisting teammates in order to move the entire product forward. </p><br><p>&nbsp; </p><br><p>What You Will Enjoy about this Role </p><ul><li><p>Delivering the engineering aspect of a professional software development process that starts from stakeholders and product owners </p></li><li><p>Collaborate with different teams to build software that not only operates for a specific vision but also fits within a more holistic purpose </p></li><li><p>Work closely with product management when new features are being considered by being an advocate for not impacting the performance or quality of the existing product. </p></li><li><p>Participate in technical discussions and communicate your ideas or vision to others. Be challenged by discussing sophisticated problems, open to debates and brainstormings. </p></li><li><p>Collaborate with the engineering team to estimate and prioritize tasks </p></li></ul><p>&nbsp; </p><p>What You Bring To The Role </p><ul><li><p>Interest in building, scaling and operating sophisticated infrastructures. </p></li><li><p>Interest in designing well-thought schemas, building efficient client/service layers, and properly using various data structures </p></li><li><p>Proficiency in C# .Net Core, Python, RxJS/React, or Node.js </p></li><li><p>An ability to adapt to changing situations where new languages, technologies, or other features will be introduced. </p></li></ul><p>&nbsp; </p><p>Nice To Have </p><ul><li><p>Experience with building RESTful API’s or GraphQL is a plus </p></li><li><p>Experience with agile development processes, working in a fast-paced environment with scheduled release planning </p></li><li><p>Experience working with advanced Business Analytics tools like Looker, Tableau, or DOMO </p></li><li><p>Experience scaling efficient relational database configurations and writing efficient SQL views, stored procedures, and functions.</p></li></ul>
